---
title: "GFM with mermaid-format:svg"
format: gfm
mermaid-format: svg
_quarto:
  tests:
    run:
      not_os: linux
    gfm:
      ensureFileRegexMatches:
        - ['img.*mermaid-figure-.*?\.svg']  # Verify markdown image link to SVG
        - []
      printsMessage:
        level: INFO
        regex: 'Using mermaid-format: svg'
        negate: true  # Should NOT print warning for GFM
---

## GFM Mermaid Test

This tests that GFM format correctly handles mermaid-format:svg without warnings.

```{mermaid}
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Decision}
  B -->|Yes| C[Option 1]
  B -->|No| D[Option 2]
  C --> E[End]
  D --> E
```

## Multi-line Labels Test

Testing that multi-line labels work (even though GFM doesn't have the clipping issue that LaTeX has):

```{mermaid}
graph TD
  A["This is a very long label<br/>with multiple lines<br/>of text content"] --> B["Another multi-line<br/>label here"]
  B --> C[Short]
```
